<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<A NAME=A001></A>
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=4>PURCHASE AND SALE
AGREEMENT </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS
PURCHASE AND SALE AGREEMENT (this &#147;Agreement&#148;) is made as of the 25th day of
October, 2002, by and between SREG Dolphin Mall, Inc., a Delaware corporation
(&#147;Seller&#148;), and Taubman-Dolphin, Inc., a Delaware corporation
(&#147;Purchaser&#148;). Unless otherwise defined herein, all capitalized terms shall have
the meaning set forth in the Partnership Agreement (as hereinafter defined). </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Taubman-Dolphin Mall Associates LLC, Dolphin Mall Holdings LLC, Seller and SREG/DMA LLC
entered into that certain Second Amended and Restated Agreement of Limited Partnership of
Dolphin Mall Associates Limited Partnership, a Delaware limited partnership (the
&#147;Partnership&#148;), dated September 8, 1999, as amended by that certain First
Amendment dated as of April 13, 2001 (such agreement as amended, the &#147;Partnership
Agreement&#148;) to set forth their respective rights, benefits, duties and obligations
with respect to the Partnership; </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the Seller owns a .5 percent general Partnership Interest (such Partnership Interest, the
&#147;Swerdlow GP Interest&#148;) in the Partnership; and </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the Seller and the Purchaser desire to consummate the transactions set forth herein. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the premises, and other good and valuable
consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties
hereto agree as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<A NAME=A002></A>
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 1. <U>Definitions</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Agreement&#148;
shall have the meaning provided in the introductory paragraph hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Business
Day&#148; shall mean any day excluding Saturday, Sunday and any day which in Miami,
Florida shall be a legal holiday or a day on which financial institutions are authorized
by law or other governmental action to close. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Closing&#148;
shall have the meaning provided in Section 5.1 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Closing
Date&#148; shall have the meaning provided in Section 5.1 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Damages&#148;
shall mean as to any Person, all damages, losses, costs and expenses incurred by such
Person, directly or indirectly, including, without limitation, all reasonable legal and
paralegal fees incurred in connection with any investigation, arbitration and/or
litigation (at trial and appellate and disbursements levels). </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Indemnified
Party&#148; shall mean a Person seeking indemnification hereunder. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 12; page: 12" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Indemnifying
Party&#148; shall mean a Person from whom indemnification is sought hereunder. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Lien&#148;
means any mortgage, pledge, hypothecation, assignment, deposit, arrangement, encumbrance,
lien (statutory or other), claim, preference, priority or other security interest of any
kind or nature whatsoever, including, without limitation, any conditional sale or other
title retention agreement, any financing or similar statement or notice filed under the
Uniform Commercial Code or any other similar recording or notice statute, and any lease or
other arrangement having substantially the same effect as any of the foregoing. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Partnership&#148;
shall have the meaning provided in the first recital hereto. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Partnership
Agreement&#148; shall have the meaning provided in the first recital hereto. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Person&#148;
means any individual, partnership, joint venture, firm, corporation, association, trust or
other enterprise or any federal, state and local domestic or foreign governmental or
regulatory authority. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Purchaser&#148;
shall have the meaning provided in the introductory paragraph hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Redemption
Agreement&#148; means that certain Redemption Agreement of even date herewith by and
between SREG/DMA LLC and Partnership. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Seller&#148;shall
have the meaning provided in the introductory paragraph hereto.  </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Settlement
Agreement&#148; means that certain Settlement Agreement of even date herewith by and among
Swerdlow Real Estate Group, Inc., SREG Operating Limited Partnership, SREG/DMA LLC,
Seller, Taubman Dolphin Mall Associates LLC, Dolphin Mall Holdings LLC, The Taubman Realty
Group Limited Partnership and Taubman Centers, Inc. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Swerdlow
GP Interest&#148; shall have the meaning provided in the second recital hereto. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 2. <U>Sale of
the Swerdlow GP Interest; Purchase Price</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.1 <U>Sale of Swerdlow GP
Interest</U>. On the Closing Date, the Seller shall assign and transfer to the Purchaser
the Swerdlow GP Interest free and clear of any Lien. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.2 <U>Purchase Price</U>. On the
Closing Date, the Purchaser shall pay to the Seller as the purchase price for the Swerdlow
GP Interest an amount equal to One Dollar ($1.00). </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 3.
<U>Representations and Warranties of the Seller</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Seller represents and warrants to the Purchaser as of the date hereof, with knowledge that
the Purchaser is relying upon the same, as follows: </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 13; page: 13" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>




<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1 <U>Authority and
Enforceability</U>. The Seller has full power and authority to execute, deliver and
perform this Agreement and the transactions contemplated hereby and has validly executed
and delivered this Agreement. This Agreement constitutes the legal, valid and binding
agreement of the Seller, enforceable in accordance with its terms, except as such
enforcement may be limited by general principles of equity or by bankruptcy, insolvency or
other similar laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally. No consent, approval or
other action by any governmental authority is required in connection with the execution,
delivery and performance by the Seller of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2 <U>Existence and Good
Standing</U>. The Seller is a corporation duly formed, validly existing and in good
standing under the laws of the State of Delaware and has full corporate power and
authority to own its property and to carry on its business as is now being conducted. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3 <U>Partnership Interest</U>. The
Seller owns the Swerdlow GP Interest free and clear of any Lien. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4 <U>Insolvency</U>. The Seller is
able to pay its debts and obligations as they mature in the usual course of its business.
The sum of the Seller&#146;s debts and obligations is less than the sum of all of the
Seller&#146;s property at fair valuation. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.5 <U>GE Capital Pledge and Credit
Agreement</U>. The Credit Agreement, dated January 15, 1999, among Swerdlow Real Estate
Group, Inc., SREG Operating Limited Partnership and certain affiliates thereof, as
borrowers, and General Electric Capital Corporation, as lender, has been satisfied and all
of the Obligations (as defined therein) have been satisfied in full. General Electric
Capital Corporation does not hold a security interest in either the Swerdlow GP Interest
or the limited partnership interest in the Partnership owned by SREG/DMA LLC. The
foregoing entities are not parties to any other Credit Agreement with General Electric
Capital Corporation. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 4.
<U>Representations and Warranties of the Purchaser</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Purchaser represents and warrants to the Seller as of the date hereof, with knowledge that
the Seller is relying upon the same, as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.1 <U>Authority and
Enforceability</U>. The Purchaser has full power and authority to execute, deliver and
perform this Agreement and the transactions contemplated hereby and has validly executed
and delivered this Agreement. This Agreement constitutes the legal, valid and binding
agreement of the Purchaser enforceable in accordance with its terms, except as such
enforcement may be limited by general principles of equity or by bankruptcy, insolvency or
other similar laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally. No consent, approval or
other action by any governmental authority is required in connection with the execution,
delivery and performance by the Purchaser of this Agreement. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 14; page: 14" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>



<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.2 <U>Existence and Good
Standing</U>. The Purchaser is a corporation duly formed, validly existing and in good
standing under the laws of the State of Delaware and has full corporate power and
authority under its organization documents to own its property and to carry on its
business as is now being conducted. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.3 <U>Insolvency</U>. The Purchaser
is able to pay its debts and obligations as they mature in the usual course of its
business. The sum of the Purchaser&#146;s debts and obligations is less than the sum of
all of the Purchaser&#146;s property at a fair valuation. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 5. <U>The
Closing; Cost and Expenses; and Deliveries</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.1 <U>Closing</U>. The consummation
of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement (the &#147;Closing&#148;) shall take
place simultaneously with the execution of this Agreement (&#147;Closing Date&#148;). </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.2 <U>Costs and Expenses</U>. Each of
the Seller and the Purchaser shall pay all of their respective fees, costs and expenses
incurred by them in connection with the transaction contemplated hereunder, including,
without limitation, their respective attorneys&#146;, consultants&#146; and other
professional fees and costs. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.3 <U>Transfer Taxes</U>. The Seller
shall pay and be responsible for all transfer taxes, if any, attributable to the
assignment of the Swerdlow GP Interest. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.4 <U>Documents to be executed and
deliveries to be made by the Seller at the Closing</U>. At the Closing, the Seller shall: </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          execute and deliver the Assignment of General Partner&#146;s Interest in the
          Partnership in the form attached as Exhibit A hereto; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          execute and deliver affidavits substantially in the forms attached as Exhibit B
          and Exhibit C hereto complying with the provisions of Section 1445(b)(2) of the
          Internal Revenue Code stating that the Seller is not a foreign person; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          deliver certified copies of resolutions authorizing the execution and delivery
          of this Agreement and the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          deliver certified copies its Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws, and all
          amendments thereto; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          deliver a Good Standing Certificate of the Seller issued by the State of
          Delaware within thirty (30) days of the date of Closing; and </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          execute and deliver a counterpart of the Certificate of Amendment to the
          Certificate of Limited Partnership in the form attached as Exhibit D hereto
          (&#147;Certificate of Amendment&#148;). </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 15; page: 15" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>



<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
5.5 <U>Documents to be executed and
deliveries to be made by the Purchaser at the Closing</U>. At the Closing, the Purchaser
shall: </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          execute and deliver the Acceptance to the Assignment of General Partner&#146;s
          Interest in the form attached as Exhibit A hereto; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          pay the Seller an amount equal to One Dollar ($1.00) as the purchase price; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          deliver certified copies of resolutions authorizing the execution and delivery
          of this Agreement and the consummation of the transaction contemplated hereby; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>

          deliver certified copies of its Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws, and all
          amendments thereto; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

          Delaware within thirty (30) days of the date of Closing; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<A NAME=A003></A>
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 6. <U>Indemnification</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
6.1 <U>Indemnification by the
Sellers</U>. From and after the Closing Date, the Seller and SREG Operating Limited
Partnership, a Delaware limited partnership, shall indemnify, defend and hold the
Purchaser harmless from and against all Damages incurred by it, arising out of, or in
connection with, the following: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          any misrepresentation or breach of any warranty made by the Seller in this
          Agreement or any certificate, agreement, instrument or document delivered by
          Seller to the Purchaser pursuant hereto; or </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          any breach by the Seller of any covenant, agreement or obligation which is
          contained in this Agreement or any certificate, agreement, instrument or
          document delivered by Seller to the Purchaser pursuant hereto. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
6.2 <U>Indemnification by the
Purchasers</U>. From and after the Closing Date, the Purchaser and The Taubman Realty
Group Limited Partnership, a Delaware limited partnership, shall indemnify, defend and
hold the Seller harmless from and against all Damages incurred by the Seller, arising out
of or in connection with the following: </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 16; page: 16" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>



<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          any misrepresentation or breach of any warranty made by the Purchaser in this
          Agreement or any certificate, agreement, instrument or document delivered by
          Purchaser to the Seller pursuant hereto; </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          any breach of any covenant, agreement or obligation of the Purchaser which is
          contained in this Agreement or any certificate, agreement, instrument or
          document delivered by Purchaser to the Seller pursuant hereto; or </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=10%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2></FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
          any liability imposed on the Seller arising out of, or resulting from, a
          Partnership obligation or the guarantee of a Partnership obligation. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
6.3 <U>Survival of Obligations</U>.
The obligations of the Seller and the Purchaser to indemnify, defend and hold harmless
pursuant to this Section 6 shall survive execution of this Agreement and the consummation
of the transactions contemplated hereby. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
6.4 <U>Party Claim Procedure</U>. If a
third party (including, without limitation, a governmental organization) asserts a claim
against a party to this Agreement and indemnification in respect of such claim is sought
under the provisions of this Section 6 by such party against another party to this
Agreement, the Indemnified Party shall promptly (but in no event later than ten (10)
Business Days prior to the time in which an answer or other responsive pleading or notice
with respect to the claim is required) give written notice to the Indemnifying Party of
such claim. The Indemnifying Party shall have the right at its election to take over the
defense or settlement of such claim by giving prompt written notice to the Indemnified
Party at least five (5) Business Days prior to the time when an answer or other responsive
pleading or notice with respect thereto is required. If the Indemnifying Party makes such
election, it may conduct the defense of such claim through counsel or representative of
its choosing (subject to the Indemnified Party&#146;s approval of such counsel or
representative, which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld), shall be responsible
for the expenses of such defense, and shall be bound by the results of its defense or
settlement of claim to the extent it produces damage or loss to the Indemnified Party. The
Indemnifying Party shall not settle any such claim without prior notice to and
consultation with the Indemnified Party unless the Indemnifying Party fully settles and
pays in full such settlement and obtains a full release of the Indemnified Party;
<U>provided however</U>, no such settlement involving any equitable relief or which might
have a material and adverse effect on the Indemnified Party may be agreed to without the
Indemnified Party&#146;s prior written consent. So long as the Indemnifying Party is
diligently contesting any such claim in good faith, the Indemnified Party may pay or
settle such claim only at its own expense. If the Indemnifying Party does not make such
election, or having made such election does not proceed diligently to defend such claim,
then the Indemnified Party may, upon three (3) Business Days&#146; written notice and at
the expense of the Indemnifying Party, take over the defense of and proceed to handle such
claim in its exclusive discretion and the Indemnifying Party shall be bound by any defense
or settlement that the Indemnified Party may make in good faith with respect to such
claim. The parties agree to cooperate in defending such third party claims and the
defending party shall have access to records, information and personnel in control of the
other party or parties which are pertinent to the defense thereof. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 17; page: 17" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>



<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 7. <U>Remedies</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except
as otherwise provided herein, the rights and remedies expressly provided herein are
cumulative and not exclusive of any rights or remedies which the parties hereto may
otherwise have at law or in equity. Nothing herein shall be construed to require any of
the parties hereto to elect among remedies. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<A NAME=A004></A>
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 8. <U>Survival of
Representations</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
respective representations and warranties of the parties contained in this Agreement or in
any certificate or statement delivered pursuant hereto shall survive the consummation of
the transactions contemplated hereby. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<A NAME=A005></A>
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 9. <U>Miscellaneous</U>. </FONT> </P>

required or permitted pursuant to this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed
to have been given when delivered in person or when mailed by certified mail, return
receipt requested, postage prepaid, or sent by overnight private courier service as
follows: </FONT></P>

<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>




<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.2 <U>Severability</U>. In the event
any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable for any
reason and in any respect, such invalidity, illegality or unenforceability shall in no
event affect, prejudice or disturb the validity of the remainder of this Agreement, which
shall be in full force and effect and enforceable in accordance with its terms. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.3 <U>Gender and Number</U>. Whenever
the context of this Agreement requires, the gender of all words herein shall include the
masculine, feminine and neuter, and the number of all words herein shall include the
singular and plural. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.4 <U>Divisions and Headings</U>. The
divisions of this Agreement into sections and subsections and the use of captions and
headings in connection therewith are solely for convenience and shall have no legal effect
whatsoever in construing the provisions of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.5 <U>Entire
Agreement/Amendment/Counterparts</U>. This Agreement supersedes all previous contracts,
and constitutes the entire agreement of whatsoever kind or nature existing between or
among the parties respecting the subject matter hereof and no party shall be entitled to
other benefits than those specified herein. All prior representations or agreements,
whether written or verbal, not expressly incorporated herein, are superseded, and no
changes in or additions to this Agreement shall be recognized unless and until made in
writing and signed by all parties hereto. In entering into this Agreement, no party hereto
is relying on any statement, representation, warranty or agreement except for the
statements, representations, warranties and agreements expressly set forth in this
Agreement and the Settlement Agreement and Redemption Agreement. This Agreement may be
executed in two or more counterparts, including facsimile counterparts, each and all of
which shall be deemed an original and all of which together shall constitute but one and
the same instrument. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.6 <U>Governing Law</U>. The
interpretation, construction and enforcement of this Agreement, and all matters relating
hereto, shall be governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, without giving effect to
any principles of law governing choice of law. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.7 <U>Waiver of Breach</U>. The
waiver by either party of a breach or violation of any provision of this Agreement shall
not operate as, or be construed to be, a waiver of any subsequent breach of the same or
other provisions hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.8 <U>Jurisdiction</U>. The parties
hereto agree that any suit brought to enforce this Agreement shall be brought in the
United States District Court, Southern District of Florida, and, by execution and delivery
of this Agreement, each of the parties to this Agreement hereby irrevocably accepts and
waives all objection to, the exclusive jurisdiction of the aforesaid courts in connection
with any suit brought to enforce this Agreement, and irrevocably agrees to be bound by any
judgment rendered thereby. Each of the parties hereto hereby agrees that service of
process in any such proceeding may be made by giving notice to such party in the manner
and at the place set forth in Section 9.1 herein. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 19; page: 19" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>



<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.9 <U>Attorneys&#146; Fees</U>. The
prevailing party in any dispute between the parties hereto, or any of them, arising
hereunder or relating hereto shall be entitled to an award of reasonable attorneys&#146;
fees, costs and expenses at trial and through all appellate levels. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.10 <U>Successors</U>. This Agreement
shall be binding upon the parties hereto and their permitted respective successors and
permitted assigns. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.11 <U>Exclusivity</U>. This
Agreement is for the exclusive benefit of the parties hereto and their respective
permitted successors hereunder, and shall not be deemed to give, either express or
implied, any legal or equitable right, remedy or claim to any other entity or person
whatsoever. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.12 <U>Assignment</U>. Neither this
Agreement nor any right, remedy, obligation or liability arising hereunder or by reason
hereof may be assigned or delegated by any party to this Agreement without the prior
written consent of all other parties to this Agreement, which consent shall not be
withheld to the assignment by Seller to the direct or indirect beneficial owners of Seller
on the date hereof in connection with the liquidation of Seller, SREG Operating Limited
Partnership or Swerdlow Real Estate Group, Inc., but otherwise may be withheld by such
other parties in their sole and absolute discretion. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.13 <U>Rule of Construction</U>. This
Agreement shall be interpreted without regard to any presumption or rule requiring
construction against the party causing this Agreement to be drafted. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
9.14 <U>Further Assurances</U>. The
parties to this Agreement shall execute and deliver such further instruments and do such
further acts and things as may reasonably be required to carry out the intent and purposes
of this Agreement promptly upon request from the other party. In addition, Seller agrees
to cooperate with the Partnership, at the Partnership&#146;s expense, in connection with
leasing matters in which Seller, a Swerdlow Affiliate (as defined in the Redemption
Agreement) or any employee of any Swerdlow Affiliate have been involved relating to the
Dolphin Mall by producing files and records, attending hearings and cooperating as
witnesses, provided that with respect to attending hearings and cooperating as witnesses,
Seller&#146;s ability to produce specific individuals will be limited to requesting the
cooperation of such individuals if such individuals are not then employed by Seller or a
Swerdlow Affiliate. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Minor Center-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<A NAME=A006></A>
<P ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>[SIGNATURES ON NEXT PAGE] </FONT></P>

<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>

<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this Agreement as of the day and year
first above written. </FONT></P>


<TABLE WIDTH="40%" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
     <TH><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"></FONT></TH></TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
     <TD WIDTH="100%"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"><B>THE SELLER:</B><BR>
<BR>
SREG DOLPHIN MALL, INC.<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
By: <U>/s/ Theodore R. Stotzer </U><BR>

<A NAME=A001></A>
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=4>REDEMPTION AGREEMENT </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS
REDEMPTION AGREEMENT (this &#147;Agreement&#148;) is made as of the 25<SUP>th</SUP> day of
October, 2002, by and between SREG/DMA LLC, a Delaware limited liability company
(&#147;Swerdlow Limited Partner&#148;), and Dolphin Mall Associates Limited Partnership, a
Delaware limited partnership (the &#147;Partnership&#148;). Unless otherwise defined
herein, all capitalized terms shall have the meaning set forth in the Partnership
Agreement (as hereinafter defined). </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Taubman-Dolphin Mall Associates LLC, a Delaware limited liability company, Dolphin Mall
Holdings LLC, a Delaware limited liability company, SREG Dolphin Mall, Inc., a Delaware
corporation (&#147;Swerdlow General Partner&#148;), and Swerdlow Limited Partner entered
into that certain Second Amended and Restated Agreement of Limited Partnership of Dolphin
Mall Associates Limited Partnership, a Delaware limited partnership (the
&#147;Partnership&#148;), dated September 8, 1999, as amended by that certain First
Amendment dated as of April 13, 2001<SUP>1</SUP> (such agreement as amended, the
&#147;Partnership Agreement&#148;), to set forth their respective rights, benefits, duties
and obligations with respect to the Partnership; and </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
immediately prior to the Closing hereunder, Taubman-Dolphin, Inc. purchased the general
partnership interest in the Partnership owned by Swerdlow General; </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Swerdlow Limited Partner owns a 49.5 percent limited Partnership Interest (such
partnership interest, the &#147;Swerdlow LP Interest&#148;) in the Partnership; </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the premises, and other good and valuable
consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties
hereto agree as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Left-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<A NAME=A002></A>
<P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;Section 1. <U>Definitions</U>. </FONT> </P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Aggregate
Purchase Price&#148; shall have the meaning provided in Section 5.1 hereof. </FONT></P><BR><BR><BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Footnote Rule" FSL="Workstation" -->
<HR SIZE=1 NOSHADE WIDTH=15% ALIGN=LEFT>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Hang Lv 5-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><SUP>1</SUP></FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH=95%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>
The First Amendment dated as of April 13, 2001, incorrectly reflects SREG Dolphin Mall LLC
as the owner of the Swerdlow LP Interest. The parties hereto acknowledge and agree and
Swerdlow General Partner and the Swerdlow Limited Partner represent and warrant to the
Partnership that SREG/DMA LLC has at all times held the Swerdlow LP Interest since
September 8, 1999 and the reflection of SREG Dolphin Mall LLC as the owner of the Swerdlow
LP Interest in the First Amendment or any other document is a scrivener&#146;s error. </FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>

<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 1; page: 1" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Agreement&#148;
shall have the meaning provided in the introductory paragraph hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Agreement
Rights Assignment&#148; shall have the meaning provided in Section 6.4(b) hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Business
Day&#148; means any day excluding Saturday, Sunday and any day which in Miami, Florida
shall be a legal holiday or a day on which financial institutions are authorized by law or
other governmental action to close. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Closing&#148;
shall have the meaning provided in Section 6.1 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Closing
Date&#148; shall have the meaning provided in Section 6.1 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Commitment&#148;
means that ALTA Owner Marketability Title Insurance Policy Commitment issued to Swerdlow
Limited Partner by the Title Company with respect to the Outparcels in form acceptable to
Swerdlow Limited Partner, in its sole discretion. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Control&#148;
of a Person (including, with correlative meaning the terms &#147;controlling&#148;,
&#147;controlled by&#148; and &#147;under common control with&#148;) means possession by
the applicable Person or Persons of the ownership of a majority of the voting securities
of such Person. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Damages&#148;
means as to any Person, all damages, losses, costs and expenses incurred by such Person,
directly or indirectly, including, without limitation, all reasonable legal and paralegal
fees incurred in connection with any investigation, arbitration and/or litigation (at
trial and appellate and disbursements levels). </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Development
Rights Assignment&#148; shall have the meaning provided in Section 6.4(c) hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;District&#148;
means the Beacon Tradeport Community Development District. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Environment&#148;
means soil, surface waters, groundwaters, land, stream, sediments, surface or subsurface
strata or ambient air. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Environmental
Law(s)&#148; means and includes any environmental or health and safety-related law,
regulation, rule, ordinance, or legally enforceable requirement at the foreign, U.S.
federal, state or local level. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Governmental
Authority&#148; means any federal, state or local domestic or foreign governmental or
regulatory authority. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Hazardous
Materials&#148; means and includes any hazardous waste, hazardous material, hazardous
substance, petroleum product, oil, toxic substance, pollutant, contaminant, asbestos, urea
formaldehyde, or other human health or safety matter, as defined or regulated under any
Environmental Law. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 2; page: 2" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

Waste&#148; means and includes any hazardous waste as defined or regulated under any
Environmental Law. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Indemnified
Party&#148; means a Person seeking indemnification hereunder. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Indemnifying
Party&#148; means a Person from whom indemnification is sought hereunder. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Knowledge&#148;
means (i) with respect to Swerdlow Limited Partner, the actual knowledge (excluding
imputed or constructive knowledge) of any of Michael Swerdlow, Theodore Stotzer, Richard
Bassell, Frank Zohn and Sidney Atzmon and (ii) with respect to the Partnership, the actual
knowledge (excluding imputed or constructive knowledge) of any of Robert Taubman, Steven
Eder and Peter DeGalan. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Lien&#148;
means any mortgage, pledge, hypothecation, assignment, deposit, arrangement, encumbrance,
lien (statutory or other), claim, preference, priority or other security interest of any
kind or nature whatsoever, including, without limitation, any conditional sale or other
title retention agreement, any financing or similar statement or notice filed under the
Uniform Commercial Code or any other similar recording or notice statute, and any lease or
other arrangement having substantially the same effect as any of the foregoing. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

Term Lease&#148; shall have the meaning provided in Section 5.1 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

means those two certain parcels of land more particularly described on Exhibit A hereto. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

Agreement&#148; shall have the meaning provided in the first recital hereto. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Permitted
Transferee&#148; means any one or more of Swerdlow OP, SREG, an entity directly or
indirectly wholly owned by Swerdlow OP and/or SREG or an entity controlled by one or more
of the Persons who are in control of SREG as of the date hereof which is formed to receive
the liquidating distribution of one or more of Swerdlow Limited Partner, Swerdlow OP or
SREG. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

means any individual, partnership, joint venture, firm, corporation, association, trust or

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

and Sale Agreement&#148; means that Purchase and Sale Agreement of even date herewith by
and between Swerdlow General Partner and Taubman-Dolphin, Inc. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Release&#148;
means any releasing, spilling, leaking, pumping, pouring, emitting, emptying, discharging,
injecting, escaping, leaching, disposing, or dumping into the Environment. </FONT></P>

<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

Agreement&#148; means that certain Settlement Agreement of even date herewith by and among

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Workstation" -->

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Large Indent Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
